books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.review: One of the most magical experiences I’ve had. The world-building and characters just pull you right in. Truly a story that will stick with me forever.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.review: I loved how the mystery unfolded in this one. It was darker and creepier than the first book but equally engaging. A great follow-up in the series!

books.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.review: Such a gripping and atmospheric read! The eerie setting on the moors and Sherlock’s genius made it impossible to put down. Easily one of the best mysteries I’ve ever read.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.review: I loved how the mystery unfolded in this one. It was darker and creepier than the first book but equally engaging. A great follow-up in the series!

books.title: Story of My Life
books.author: Viraj Patel
books.review: Best book I have ever read. I loved it. I can't wait to read the next one.
